survey_metadata.context: Users were asked to suggest features after completing core product tasks

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: I really need a way to collaborate in real-time with my team. Right now I have to export files and send them via email or Slack, which is clunky. If I could just share a link and have people comment or edit directly, that would be a game-changer. Like Figma but for this tool.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: Better reporting and analytics. I want to see how my projects are performing over time, not just current status. Dashboards with charts, trends, that kind of thing. Right now I have to export data and make my own reports in Excel, which is tedious.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: API access. I need to integrate this with other tools I use. Right now everything is manual, which doesn't scale. If I could pull data via API or trigger actions programmatically, I could automate a lot of my workflow.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: Templates. I do similar projects all the time, and I have to recreate everything from scratch each time. If I could save a project as a template and reuse it, that would save me hours. Even better if there were pre-made templates for common use cases.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: A mobile app. I'm always on the go, and I can't always access the web version. If I could check things or make quick edits from my phone, that would be really helpful. Even if it's just basic features, that's better than nothing.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: Better search functionality. I have hundreds of projects, and finding the right one is a pain. The current search is too basic - I need filters, tags, date ranges, that kind of thing. Maybe even saved searches or smart folders.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: Version history. I make a lot of changes, and sometimes I want to go back to an earlier version. Right now I have to manually save copies, which is messy. If there was automatic versioning like Google Docs, that would be perfect.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: Custom fields and workflows. Every team works differently, and the current structure is too rigid. I need to be able to add custom fields, create my own workflows, set up automation rules. Basically, make it work the way my team works, not the other way around.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: Better notifications. I need to know when things happen, but right now I either get too many notifications or not enough. I want to customize what I'm notified about and how. Email, push, in-app - let me choose what works for me.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: Bulk operations. I often need to update or delete multiple items at once, but I have to do them one by one. That's fine for a few items, but when I have 50 or 100, it's a nightmare. Let me select multiple items and apply actions to all of them.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: Keyboard shortcuts. I use this tool all day, and I'm constantly clicking around. If I could use keyboard shortcuts for common actions, I'd be so much faster. Even basic ones like Cmd+S to save, Cmd+N for new, that kind of thing.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: Integration with Slack. My team uses Slack for everything, and I want to get notifications there. Also, it would be cool if I could create or update things directly from Slack, like with slash commands or something.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: Export options. I need to export data in different formats - CSV, Excel, PDF, JSON. Right now the export options are limited, and the formatting is always off. I end up having to reformat everything manually, which defeats the purpose.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: Calendar integration. I want to see my deadlines and milestones in my calendar app. Right now I have to manually add them, which is annoying. If it synced automatically, that would be amazing. Google Calendar, Outlook, whatever.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: Better help and documentation. When I'm stuck, I don't know where to look. The help center is hard to search, and the documentation is outdated. I want contextual help - like tooltips or inline guides that show me what to do right when I need it.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: Webhooks. I need to know when things change so I can trigger actions in other systems. If I could set up webhooks for events like 'project created' or 'status changed', I could automate a lot of my workflow.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: Dark mode. I use this tool all day, and the bright white background is hard on my eyes. I know it's a small thing, but it would make a big difference for my comfort. Plus, it just looks cooler.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: Better permissions and roles. I need fine-grained control over who can see and edit what. Right now it's too all-or-nothing. I want to be able to set permissions at the project level, item level, field level. That kind of granularity.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: Activity feed. I want to see what's happening across all my projects in one place. Who's doing what, when things are updated, comments, changes - all in a timeline view. Right now I have to check each project individually.

responses.question: What feature would make this product most valuable to you?
responses.response_text: Formulas and calculations. I need to do math on my data - sums, averages, percentages, that kind of thing. Right now I have to export to Excel, do the calculations, then import back. If I could do it directly in the tool, that would save so much time.
